pages.text: The $(major)Plasmid Injector/$ uses FE to inject completed $(l:geneticsresequenced:items/plasmid)Plasmids/$ into a $(l:geneticsresequenced:items/syringe)Syringe/$.$(br2)You can inject as many Plasmids into a single Syringe as you want.
The Syringe must be full of uncontaminated blood.$(br2)Decontaminate blood in the $(l:geneticsresequenced:blocks/blood_purifier)Blood Purifier/$.
